creditline: Gift of Eula M. Ganz in memory of her husband, Paul H. Ganz

texts.textentryhtml:
Thomas Agnew & Sons, London (1966).

Anonymous sale, Greenwood, London, March 6, 1806, lot 71; anonymous sale, Robins, London, July 30, 1808, lot 74; anonymous sale, Robins, London, April 10, 1809, lots 58, 59; Viancini, Venice (1966); Paul and Eula M. Ganz, New York (by 1967); Eula M. Ganz (until 1986; gift to Princeton University Art Museum).

caption: Giacomo del Po (Italian, 1652–1726), Sleep of Adam and Eve, ca. 1703–08. Oil on canvas; 126 x 101 cm, 145.5 × 120 × 6 cm (frame). Gift of Eula M. Ganz in memory of her husband, Paul H. Ganz (y1986-83)
